com.esri.mo2.client.aims
Interface ServerProxy

All Superinterfaces:
LayerSource, ServiceUser
All Known Implementing Classes:
FeatureServer, ImageServer
Deprecated. - the interface has been deprecated, see Content API.

public interface ServerProxy
extends ServiceUser, LayerSource

This interface exemplifies common characteristics of the FeatureServer and ImageServer and is used by the LayerInfo code, shared between the two LayerSources.
